sky_code_snippet_copy_to_clipboard_butto._description: The ARIA label for the copy-code-to-clipboard button

sky_code_snippet_copy_to_clipboard_succe._description: The message displayed to the user when the text is successfully saved to the clipboard

sky_code_example_viewer_demo_hidden_mess._description: The message displayed to the user when an example's demo is hidden
sky_code_example_viewer_demo_hidden_mess.message: Open this code example in StackBlitz to view the demo.

sky_code_example_viewer_demo_stack_blitz._description: The label for the button that launches the code example in StackBlitz

sky_code_example_viewer_hide_code_button._description: The ARIA label for the button that hides the example code snippet

sky_code_example_viewer_show_code_button._description: The ARIA label for the button that shows the example code snippet
